scenario: Charlie received the following amounts during the year: Gift from Parents: $12,223.05, Return of Capital: $47,440.94, Gambling Winnings: $44,063.96.
question: Calculate Charlie's gross income under I.R.C. § 61.
answer_explanation: Gross income includes all income from whatever source derived, unless excluded. Total: $44,063.96.
reasoning: Summed included items, ignored excluded items (Gifts, Loans, etc.).
